subject: Human Growth Hormone
Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The team left the outfielder off its postseason roster after Major League Baseball notified the Giants that Jose Guillen had been tied to shipments of performance-enhancers.
snippet: The team left the outfielder off its postseason roster after Major League Baseball notified the Giants that Jose Guillen had been tied to shipments of performance-enhancers.
